bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Maguindanao province with 21 reports followed by Sulu province with 20 reports.
The largest adm_2 is Patikul municipality with 13 reports followed by with 13 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Sulu province with 339 reports followed by Basilan province with 319 reports.
The largest adm_2 is with 792 reports followed by Patikul municipality with 112 reports.
